content.question: Kara Walker’s installation Darkytown Rebellion has been interpreted as challenging the historical erasure of African Americans because of its

choices.label: video projections which engage the viewer’s space
silhouettes that were drawn from historical visuals
ambiguous depiction of a historical rebellion

content.answer: silhouettes that were drawn from historical visuals

topic.text: 10.4: Theories and Interpretations of Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Explain how one or more art historically valid interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art) are derived from an analysis of its form, style, materials, content, function, context, reception, and/or meaning.
